name: Mace of the ancient dragon (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (magnificent in general).
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
It increases damage like a god.
It does asphyxiation damage like a god.
This weapon has been saturated by evil through the ages it
lied next to the great dragon. A part of the chaos known as
Tiamat still reflects on the weapon as it constantly changes
between states of flashing with electricity, corroding flesh
